title: Not Getting Any Keys Or S Tokens
body: So... some one help im getting an s- and s+ and i check my loot and nothing is There some one help and i never get keys i have 73 chests not 1 key

replies.body: I'd like to help but need more specifics.  If you're level 6, then you need an S or S+ to receive a 7 token.  Key fragments are also not guaranteed.  Per our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, the drop rate increases the more you obtain them, until it refreshed about every 28 days.  Check out the guide, and let me know if you have any questions afterwards!
